name: CVE-2010-2553
description: The Cinepak codec in Microsoft Windows XP SP2 and SP3, Windows Vista SP1 and SP2, and Windows 7 does not properly decompress media files, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted file, aka "Cinepak Codec Decompression Vulnerability."
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:-:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp1:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:-:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:*:sp3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
